imdb.plot outline: Tatiana Sorokko - the first Russian model to have a successful career in the West. Now she is in Moscow to present her own collection, reflecting the history of haute couture. Has Moscow become a capital of world fashion? Why are Russian girls becoming increasingly popular on the runways of the most prestigious fashion shows? Tatiana Sorokko spoke with Spotlight to answer these questions.
imdb.title: Spotlight
plot: Alexandr Gurnov interviews Tatiana Sorokko, one of Russia's most famous and beautiful models, as she discusses fashion, style and her exhibition at the Moscow Fashion Museum.::Anonymous

Tatiana Sorokko - the first Russian model to have a successful career in the West. Now she is in Moscow to present her own collection, reflecting the history of haute couture. Has Moscow become a capital of world fashion? Why are Russian girls becoming increasingly popular on the runways of the most prestigious fashion shows? Tatiana Sorokko spoke with _Spotlight_ (qv) to answer these questions.::RT Staff Writers
